page.title: 08FLEETWOOD MARINE COMPLEX
page.content: Fleetwood is not a miniature Blackpool, nor a poor relation of that great resort; it is a fine sea-side resort with outstanding provision for those visitors who enjoy active as well as spectator sports. From the junction of Beach Rd and Laidley's Walk to the Mount, a mile away, the Marine Complex stretches out. First is the Lake Complex, with model boats and yachting, canoes, rowing boats and pedal boats and a wind-surfing marina. Then there are an 18-hole miniature golf course, a 9-hole pitch and putt course and bowling greens. Finally the Marine Hall provides indoor bowling, a lounge bar, beer garden and cafe and the adjoining Leisure Centre offers a sports hall and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Amusement arcades on the pier, and fairground rides in Corrigans Playground end the Complex.
